Add new horse

Try find your horse
Sex
  • {{breed}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-horse', templateUrl: './add-horse.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-horse.component.css'] }) export class AddHorseComponent implements OnInit { breeds: string[]=["breed1","breed2","breed3","breed4"]; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } showBreed(){ } }
